1001.name: Warrior's Omamori
1001.special_effect_desc:
A kendo figure is sewn on it. It feels like something a kendo practitioner would wear...

<color=#297DE0>No special effects.</color>

1002.name: Conch Necklace
1002.special_effect_desc:
A necklace that's just a conch on a string. It doesn't look like much, but people who like nature and the sea would surely appreciate it...

<color=#297DE0>No special effects.</color>

1003.name: Horse Ranch Postcard
1003.special_effect_desc:
A commemorative postcard issued in conjunction with a horse ranch, featuring famous equine prizewinners.

<color=#297DE0>No special effects.</color>

1004.name: Brand New Notebook
1004.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>two-way vending cabinet</color> or a <color=#297DE0>full-angle vending cabinet</color>, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 10</color>.

1005.name: Metal Mane Comb
1005.special_effect_desc: When the number of containers selling this product is <color=#297DE0>no more than 8</color>, the additional sales capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 15</color>.

2001.name: White Musk Fragrance
2001.special_effect_desc:
A non-flammable white musk fragrance with a refreshing and comforting scent.

<color=#297DE0>No special effects.</color>

2002.name: Gold Lacquer Folding Fan
2002.special_effect_desc:
An example of traditional Sasanami craftsmanship, this tasteful gold lacquer folding fan features elegant patterns.
Gazing at the fan, you can almost see the ebbs and flows of Sasanami's high society over the course of history.

<color=#297DE0>No special effects.</color>

2003.name: Oolong Qingshan
2003.special_effect_desc:
Native to Xu Heng's North Isle, these alpine tea leaves were prepared through a traditional semi-fermentation process.

<color=#297DE0>No special effects</color>.

2004.name: Sake Pot
2004.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>two-way vending cabinet</color> or a <color=#297DE0>full-angle vending cabinet</color>, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 10</color>.

2005.name: Guqin Music Scores
2005.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>Lv. 3</color> vending cabinet, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 15</color>.

3001.name: Chisel Set for Beginners
3001.special_effect_desc:
These chiseling tools are not as complete as what an advanced set has, but they are more suitable for creators who have not reached the peak of their skills.

<color=#297DE0>No special effects</color>.

3002.name: Boat Grill Set
3002.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>Lv. 2</color> vending cabinet, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 5</color>.

3003.name: Rostach Pocketknife
3003.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>two-way vending shelf</color> or a <color=#297DE0>full-angle vending shelf</color>, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 10</color>.

3004.name: Fishing Master's Rod
3004.special_effect_desc: When the number of containers selling this product is <color=#297DE0>no less than 4</color>, the additional sales capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 15</color>.

3005.name: Cigar Cutter
3005.special_effect_desc: When the number of containers selling this product is <color=#297DE0>no more than 6</color>, the additional sales capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 15</color>.

4001.name: Music Box
4001.special_effect_desc:
A music box with two dolls that move around the center like carousel horses when you wind it up.

<color=#297DE0>No special effects.</color>

4002.name: Haute Perfume
4002.special_effect_desc: When the <color=#297DE0>total number of shelves in the store is greater than 12</color>, the additional sales capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 5</color>.

4003.name: Vinyl Record
4003.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>two-way vending station</color> or a <color=#297DE0>full-angle vending station</color>, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 10</color>.

4004.name: Golf Club
4004.special_effect_desc: When placed on a <color=#297DE0>Lv. 3</color> vending cabinet, the additional vending capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 15</color>.

4005.name: Omorfies Essential Oil
4005.special_effect_desc: When the number of containers selling this product is <color=#297DE0>no more than 2</color>, the additional sales capacity provided by this product <color=#E78300>increases by 15</color>.
